title: Front-end Developer
description: Translated design files into responsive marketing websites using HTML, Sass, Bootstrap and JavaScript/jQuery, focusing on usability and accessibility.
Implemented updates and improvements to WordPress themes, building custom page templates to showcase additional business offerings.
Tested and optimized performance of consumer-facing websites, resulting in a 100% improvement from benchmark performance metrics. Developed documentation to facilitate future improvement initiatives.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an agile environment to meet business and technical requirements.
Ensured proper performance and integration of third-party services.

title: Full-stack Developer
company: Codeca Educational Technology and Services Inc.
description: Recreate primary lesson modules from scratch - writing, editing, and utilizing JavaScript to implement the updated curriculum on the browser-based virtual reality coding platform.
Update the subscription flow user interface along with Stripe payment integration, simplifying the user on-boarding experience. Implement updates with JavaScript, HTML, and Sass.

title: Teaching Assistant
description: Assisted instructors by grading assignments and providing feedback to term 1 and term 2 students in the Post-degree Web and Mobile App Design & Development (WMDD) program.
Courses marked: HTML/CSS 2 and Graphic Design for Web.

title: Marketing Communications Specialist
company: Big Brothers Big Sisters of Metro Milwaukee
description: Served as agency's marketing and graphic design lead, collaborating with program staff to meet agency marketing and recruitment needs.
Managed and executed agency web strategy, including content, design improvements and site expansion. I implemented updates on the WordPress CMS.
Created a comprehensive marketing strategy to enhance agency reach in the local market, leading to increased volunteer sign-ups and recognition.

title: Marketing & Digital Communications Coordinator
description: Served as the marketing and digital content lead and graphic designer.
Managed all agency website updates and additions on Umbraco CMS, ensuring a consistent brand throughout assets.
Worked with an outside web design firm to manage and assist in the rebuild and re-branding of five agency websites, served as the internal project leader.
Managed targeted multi-channel enrollment marketing for the agency's public charter schools.
Led Latino Arts, Inc. marketing, managing a ~$15,000 marketing budget.

title: Communications and Development Assistant
company: Milwaukee Institute of Art and Design
description: Managed the production and output of the college's monthly e-newsletter and managed college social media accounts, increasing engagement among target audiences.
Successfully designed and managed the production of event signage for the 10th anniversary of the college's largest annual fundraiser.
Created and published original content on the college's website.
